category.name: Systems Engineering
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CrossProbing_RelationTraversalType
preference.preference_description: Defines the direction of the current cross-domain tracing operation. The user sets the direction with the Relations Traversal Type option in the Options dialog box. Valid Values: 0 - Specifies that the source is the primary (defining) object in a relation. The trace highlights related objects downstream. 1 - Specifies that the source is secondary (complying) object in a relation. The trace highlights related objects upstream. 2 - Specifies that the source is both a primary (defining) and a secondary (complying) object in a relation. The trace highlights related objects downstream and upstream.
